Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Beta-defensin 13 (BD-13, mBD-13; Defensin, beta 13; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in testis and to a lesser extent in epididymis (caput, corpus and cauda). Also weakly expressed in kidneys.

Literature.Title: Signal sequence conservation and mature peptide divergence within subgroups of the murine beta-defensin gene family.
Literature.Author: Morrison G.M, Semple C.A.M, Kilanowski F.M, Hill R.E, Dorin J.R.

Literature.Title: Identification on mouse chromosome 8 of new beta-defensin genes with regionally specific expression in the male reproductive organ.
Literature.Author: Zaballos A, Villares R, Albar JP, Martínez-A C, Márquez G.
